title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 80.13 - Prefiling procedure (optional)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 80.13 - Prefiling procedure (optional)

State Regulations
(a) Prior to formal filing of an offering, an issuer may submit the proposed offering literature to the Department of Law and request a prefiling
conference. Three copies of such prospectus and two copies of an unsigned form INTRASTATE 1 (Filing of Intrastate Prospectus) should accompany such
request together with draft copies of all supplemental information documents as set forth in section
80.3
hereof. (b) Where an issuer proposes to use form INTRASTATE 5 (Short Form Prospectus) in lieu of a full prospectus, two
unsigned copies of forms INTRASTATE 1 and 5 together with draft copies of all supplemental information documents as set forth in section
80.3
of this Part should be submitted to the

Department of Law with a request for a prefiling conference. (c) Where an issuer seeks an exemption from
any requirement a single draft copy of an exemption application should be submitted to the Department of Law with a request for a prefiling
conference. (d) Issuers and their counsel who wish prefiling conferences at a Department of Law office
other than the New York City office should so indicate in their conference request so that provision can be made to send personnel from the New York

City office to the other office. The availability of conferences out of New York City will be dependent upon the number of requests and the
availability of personnel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
80.13

Amended

New York State Register July 3, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 27, eff. 7/3/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
